definition: the North Pole/the Arctic Pole/the north magnetic pole
(bird species of China) glaucous gull (Larus hyperboreus)

sentences.english: And the Northwest Passage in the Arctic became ice-free for the first time in living memory.
sentences.chinese: 在當今人們的記中，北極西北航道首次成爲無冰航道。

sentences.english: NorthStar, the first name in heavy-duty encoders, has the solution.
sentences.chinese: 北極星，在重型編碼器的名字，有解決方案。

sentences.english: By the tenfold blasts of the Arctic zone.
sentences.chinese: 那風比北極的烈風千倍狂暴。

sentences.english: Polar bears depend on solid sea ice for survival; it's where they do their hunting.
sentences.chinese: 北極熊在厚厚的海洋冰層上獵食，以此爲生。

sentences.english: An experiment in the nearest town to the North Pole where the sun doesn't rise for 4 months.
sentences.chinese: 在最近的鎮實驗北極那裏的太陽不上升爲4個月。

sentences.english: I have send a carton - The Polar Express.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有北極特快車完整版的電影配樂試聽。

sentences.english: In this permanently cold environment, the ice cap from t.
sentences.chinese: 在這種持續嚴寒的條件下，冰帽從北極逐漸向南擴展。

sentences.english: Polar bears evolved rapidly from brown bears within the last million years.
sentences.chinese: 北極熊在過去的100萬年來，迅速從棕熊進化而來。

sentences.english: Even with perfect viewing conditions, the lights are notoriously hit or miss.
sentences.chinese: 儘管天氣條件很好，北極光卻是來無影去無蹤。

sentences.english: Mothers and Papas Polaris 700 four players.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽們和帕帕斯北極星運動員700四。

sentences.english: Knut was only about four years old, a young adult by polar bear standards.
sentences.chinese: 克努特只有大約四歲，按北極熊的標準是個年輕人。

sentences.english: Also sometimes we ca powerful see the " North Pole light" .
sentences.chinese: 同時還有極晝極夜景象並且有時能看到北極光。

sentences.english: I am steady as a rock-fixed as the Polar Star.
sentences.chinese: 我堅定得象磐石，穩定得象北極星。

sentences.english: That dream wizard waved his hands, I saw the scenery of the Antarctic and Arctic.
sentences.chinese: 那個夢精靈雙手一揮，我看到了南極和北極的風光。

sentences.english: The detective detected that the arch was under the marching Arctic architects’ protection.
sentences.chinese: 偵察察覺拱門受到行進的北極建築師們的保護。

sentences.english: This year, the thick ice cap barely penetrates the bull's-eye of the Arctic Circle.
sentences.chinese: 今年，厚冰蓋纔剛剛穿過北極圈中心。

definition: east/east side/eastern part/to the east of
south/south side/southern part/to the south of
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
dry land (as opposed to the sea)
north/north side/northern part/to the north of
